wmndsCheckboxesProps.name: items
wmndsCheckboxesProps.description: Required. Array of checkbox items objects. See items.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If html is set, this is not required. Text to use within each checkbox item label. If html is provided, the text argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If text is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each checkbox item label. If html is provided, the text argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: checked
arrayOptions.description: If true, checkbox will be checked.

arrayOptions.name: name
arrayOptions.description: Specific name for the checkbox item. If omitted, then component global name string will be applied.

arrayOptions.name: disabled
arrayOptions.description: If true, checkbox will be disabled.

wmndsCheckboxesProps.name: contentText
wmndsCheckboxesProps.description: Required. If text is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the legend. If html is provided, the text argument will be ignored.
